<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Reporting a Problem">3699c37a479012100a41fe02d16d437b</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:be99c37a479012100a41fe02d16d4380</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>If Problem Impact is High</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

   var problemImpact = g_form.getValue("problem_impact");
   var firstName = g_user.firstName;
//    alert(problemImpact);
//    alert(firstName);

   if(problemImpact == 3){
	g_form.setValue("description", firstName + " registra problema de alto impacto!");
   }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-01 14:38:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9f99c37a479012100a41fe02d16d43e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>If Problem Impact is High</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NowPro" source="x_295853_nowpro">c09c285a471012100a41fe02d16d4379</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowPro">c09c285a471012100a41fe02d16d4379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9f99c37a479012100a41fe02d16d43e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-01 14:38:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
